entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
